description: This file defines the root layout component for a Next.js frontend application, including metadata, a sidebar navigation menu, and a main content area. It uses React functional components and includes static navigation links, styling, and metadata configuration.

methods.name: NavLink
methods.description: A React component that renders a styled navigation link with a label.

methods.name: RootLayout
methods.description: The main layout component that structures the application's sidebar, header, and content area.
